song.title: Adoramus te!
song.lyrics:
[C] Adoramus te! We worship You, Lord! Jesus Christ, our Saviour and Messiah! Adoramus te! We worship you, Lord! We adore You, Jesus Christ, our Lord!
[V1] Jesus, Son of God, Saviour of the world, Image of the Father, Adoramus te! Jesus God and man, Maryâ€™s only Son, King of kings and Lord of lords, Adoramus te!
[V2] Jesus, sinners' friend, brother of the poor, Jesus, shepherd of the flock, Adoramus te! Healer of the weak, comforter of souls, Jesus, everlasting love, Adoramus te!
[V3] Jesus, living Word, ready in our need, Jesus, source of holiness, Adoramus te! Jesus, risen one, Saviour of our souls, You are way and truth and life, Adoramus te!
[V4] Jesus, Prince of Peace, teacher of our hearts, Fullness of the father's love. Adoramus te! Jesus, Lamb of God, faithful unto death, Hope of all who trust in you. Adoramus te!
[V5] Jesus, king of heav'n, joy of all the saints, Food of pilgrims, Bread of Life, Adoramus te! Glory of the Church, Holy one of God, Jesus, Risen from the dead, Adoramus te!
